title: Replace site logo with uploaded image and add Twitter/X social link

requirements.text: Replace the current site logo image with the user-uploaded image across the site (header and footer), using a static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated and updating all logo references to the new filename.

quotes: change the logo to the pic I'm sending you

acceptanceCriteria: Header logo no longer uses /assets/generated/logo-email-copywriter.dim_512x256.png and instead uses the new generated logo asset.
Footer logo no longer uses /assets/generated/logo-email-copywriter.dim_512x256.png and instead uses the new generated logo asset.
The logo renders crisply at the existing displayed size (h-8) without layout shift in header/footer.

requirements.text: Add a visible Twitter/X social link to the site that points to https://x.com/QuillworksMedia (e.g., in the header and/or footer), opening in a new tab with proper rel attributes and an accessible label.
acceptanceCriteria: A Twitter/X link is present on the marketing site UI and navigates to https://x.com/QuillworksMedia.
The link opens in a new tab and uses rel="noopener noreferrer".
The link has accessible text/aria-label indicating it is the Twitter/X profile link.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only UI component sources); compose them instead.
Keep all user-facing text in English.
nonGoals: Adding additional social networks beyond the provided Twitter/X link.
Changing SEO metadata or page copy beyond what is necessary to display the new logo and social link.

edits: Use the uploaded image as the new logo and crop/resize appropriately (20250307_184458.jpg > logo-quillworks.dim_512x256.png)
